infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Zapllo needs access to your photo library to allow you to upload and share images for tasks, projects, and team collaboration within the app.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Zapllo needs access to your microphone to enable voice recordings and audio communication features for enhanced team collaboration and task management.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Zapllo needs access to your camera to allow you to capture and share photos for tasks, projects, and team collaboration within the app.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Zapllo may use your location to provide location-based features and improve your task management experience when the app is in use.
